pr_title: Log warning for variable values exceeding 32KB

timeline.message:
chore(elasticsearch-exporter): log warning if variable exceeds size limit

- add configuration to ignore variables above which will lead to a warning
  message in the log that the variable is ignored by elasticsearch indexing
